Author: justeatingair
Text: Thank you very much!   Luckily it's only on my thighs and upper arms, and apparently it isn't as bad as it was before. So i hope to keep seeing some improvements.

Author: BEDBulimic
Text: Unless my med knowledge is failing me, there’s no shortcuts to loose skin unfortunately- hence why there are loose skin reduction surgeries (not advocating them or recommending to you necessarily, mostly it’s for former obese people who lost huge amounts and are medically approved to do it).   If you’re young, have good genetics, or do some weight training so that you “fill out” the loose skin to some degree, loose skin can kinda improve.   This ain’t formal advice tho yo, you could ask a professional for their 2 cents :)
